advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Watch TNT live. Wherever. Whenever.

Get complete access to the live network and all of your favorite TNT shows on your mobile device. Check out episode guides, watch clips and behind-the-scenes videos, set schedule reminders and even watch the live stream of TNT or on-demand episodes of Major Crimes, Falling Skies, Rizzoli & Isles and more after authenticating through your television provider. Create your personal viewing history and resume where you left off on multiple devices! 

It’s the most dramatic app you’ll ever need—now with live streaming of TNT!

TNT – We Know Drama

FEATURES:
- Ability to view both the East and West live feeds of TNT (after authenticating)
- Full Episodes of TNT Series and Movies (after authenticating)
- Continue viewing on multiple devices where you left off when viewing full episodes and movies—the app will save your place!
- Series Episode Guides
- Clips and Behind-the-Scenes Video
- Show Schedules with Reminders
- YouTube, Facebook and Twitter Integration
releaseNotes:
Thank you for all the feedback about Watch TNT – we’re listening, so please keep the feedback coming. Please tell your friends and be sure to share! 

• Now resume your favorite TNT shows and movies while have access to your viewing history across multiple devices
• Viewing Enhancements 
• Performance Improvements
